Comment: None of these people should be voting or passing any pro-crypto legislation unless they're actually capable of sitting down and explaining to their constituents what crypto currency and the block chain are, how they work, and what their environmental impacts are. If they can't do that, then they shouldn't be voting or passing any pro-crypto laws.

Comment: The idea of a Bitcoin reserve sounds like a very idiotic idea. Why would the government reserve Bitcoin? What is the use? What is the purpose? Is Bitcoin disappearing? What is the practical reason to have a reserve? Why don’t we make an Euro reserve? How about a horse manure reserve? That would be more important to reserve.
